text:
Hey everyone, Iâ€™m trying to find a way to copy this Total Enrollments number into a field in a custom object. For example, if the sequence name is the same as the business campaign name (which is a custom object), I want to copy the Total Enrollments number into the 'Numbers Enrollments' field in the matching business campaign.
Is it possible to do this through Workflow, with code, directly through HubSpot, or would I need to use an external tool like Make?
Thanks in advance!
is there a issue with the send webhook action? we were using it to send all properties and it was sending, but it seemed to have just randomly stopped sending anything over
